bibl.title: The Image of the Ordered World in Ancient Nubian Art. The Construction of the Kushite Mind, 800 BC - 300 AD. (Probleme der Ägyptologie. 18.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The sacred landscape of Nubia. - 2. Iconography and order in the world. - 3. Temple and society: historical memory and identity. - 4. Myth of the state, literacy, and literature. - Epilogue. - Bibliographical abbreviations. Index.
